bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Slip and Pull-Out Strength Testing of Bolted Dead End Strain Clamps
IEEE Guide for Slip and Pull-Out Strength Testing of Bolted Dead End Strain Clamps

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Test procedures for the slip and pullout strength certification testing of bolted dead end strain clamps for use on overhead transmission and distribution lines are covered by this guide.
Test procedures for the slip and pullout strength certification testing of bolted dead end strain clamps for use on overhead transmission and distribution lines are covered by this guide.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
